In a quiet meadow, a curious bunny named Thistle discovered a shimmering pocket watch buried beneath the roots of an ancient oak. As he pressed the button, a whirlwind of colors enveloped him, and suddenly, he found himself in the age of dinosaurs! Thistle hopped among towering ferns, dodging a playful baby T-Rex. With each tick of the watch, he leaped through timeâ€”witnessing the construction of the pyramids, sharing carrots with medieval knights, and dancing at a disco in the 70s. Eventually, he returned home, pocket watch in paw, ready to share his adventures with the other bunnies, forever a time-traveling legend.
